tool_description: An API showing all the latest ukraine-russia war around the world
name: Ukraine Live Newspaper feed
title: Ukraine Live Newspaper feed

api_list.name: GET all the news about Ukraine - Russia war from a specific newspaper
api_list.description: Gets newspaper article titles and URLs from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-live-newspaper-feed.p.rapidapi.com/news/nyp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-live-newspaper-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET All Ukraine - Russia war news
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all news about the Ukraine-Russia war from all over the world
